Both are filled with humor and heart that the whole family can enjoy together!

Both "Braveheart" and "Hotel Rwanda" might be great choices for you!

"Braveheart" tells an inspiring tale of a man standing up against oppression in medieval Scotland, featuring the Academy Award-winning performance by Mel Gibson as William Wallace.

On the other hand, "Hotel Rwanda" is a powerful film based on true events during the 1994 Rwandan genocide, starring Don Cheadle as a hotel manager who saves over a thousand lives amidst the chaos. It offers an insightful look at human resilience in the face of adversity.

I hope these recommendations help you make your decision!
